text: Aur jo log kal uss kay martabay per phonchney ki aarzoo mandiyan ker rahey thay woh aaj kehney lagay kay kiya tum nahi dekhtay kay Allah Taalaa hi apnay bandon mein say jiss kay liye chahaye rozi kushada ker deta hai aur tang bhi? Agar Allah Taalaa hum per fazal na kerta to humen bhi dhansa deta kiya dekhtay nahi ho kay na-shukron ko kabhi kaamyabi nahi hoti
